overview: Nilavariyathe is a Malayalam movie starring Anumol K Manoharan and Bala Kumar in prominent roles. The movie also stars Santhosh Keezhattoor, Indrans, Kalasala Babu and Sajitha Madathil. It is a drama directed by Uthpal V Nayanar with Kanjangad Ramachandran as musician, forming part of the crew.
title: Nilavariyathe
